channel.title: "you need to be in the wilderness to attack this player"
channel.description:
I asked about this yesterday and didn't get any help. I am sure many of you are capable of doing this =). Right now in my server you can attack someone thats in the wild even if you are not. How can i make it so that you also need to be in the wild to attack a player.
Another thing, do any of you know how to make the objects of a dead player appear right away after they die? I really need answers to these questions. Help is greatly appreciated Thanks
